reviewText: Please do purchase, you'll be amazed, if your from the state of Maine it's for you, truth in Penobscot Indians not being animals unless treated as animals as all Native Americans battling for there survival, they did not slaughter until the white man showed them such atrocities of slaughter, they fought back, the stories in reverse is how it was, never mind white stories of there being murders, it was us whites that shed first blood stealing there lands, our forefathers were murderers and thieves

I read and watched The Sign of the Beaver in school and loved the movie! I wanted to watch it again so i ordered this one that came with 3 additional movies.
All of the movies are pretty decent and revolve around slightly similar topics, but have different story lines/plots.
Case came in brand new and the CD's were clean and unused.
Sign of the Beaver is the winner here.
These were great movies! I would encourage anyone to view them. There needs to be more made like this as far as I'm concerned!
I read this book to my class every year.  We like to watch the movie and compare the two.  It's very different from the book, but still great!!
